qas.question: On what holiday do insurgents plan to detonate a bomb?
Who removed James Bond from active service?
What group does C support England joining?
Which character is promoted to M?
Which holiday was the terrorist bombing planned for?
Which two intelligence groups merged to form Joint Intelligence Service?
What does Bond take from Marco Sciarra?
007 James Bond kills four men in a mission in which city?
Marco Scciarra's necklace has what animal on it?
Q suspends whom from field duty?
What consists of the recently merged MI55 and MI66?

context: Following <a4_0>Garreth <a1_0>M<a1_0/>allory<a4_0/>'s promotion to M, on a mission in <b8_0>Mexico<b8_0/> <a2_0>C<a2_0/>ity unofficially ordered by a posthumous message from the previous M, 007 James Bond kills three men plotting a terrorist bombing during the <a0_0><a5_0>Day of the Dead<a5_0/><a0_0/> and gives chase to <b9_0>Marco Sciarra<b9_0/>, an assassin who survived the attack. In the ensuing struggle, Bond steals <a7_0>his ring<a7_0/>, which is emblazoned with a stylised <b10_0>octopus<b10_0/>, and then kills Sciarra by kicking him out of a helicopter. Upon returning to London, <b11_0>Bond<b11_0/> is indefinitely suspended from field duty by M, who is in the midst of a power struggle with C, the head of the privately-backed <b12_0>Joint Intelligence Service<b12_0/>, consisting of the recently merged <a6_0>MI5 and MI6<a6_0/>. C campaigns for Britain to form alongside 8 other countries "<a3_0>Nine Eyes<a3_0/> ", a global surveillance and intelligence co-operation initiative between nine member states, and uses his influence to close down the '00' section, believing it to be outdated.
